channel.title: Can someone explain MineCraft to me?
channel.description: So I've been looking into minecraft and it's confusing... Is it like you customize your own server? Or is is it all like premade and you just host it for people to play? I'm not quite understanding... Can someone please explain? lol

item.title: Can someone explain MineCraft to me?
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:4, topic:436402”][quote author=Acorn_ link=topic=539112.msg3945275#msg3945275 date=1331785454]
I find it more enjoyable to play single player, basically you just build a house and mine resources and try to survive.

[/quote]
This, before even looking into joining multiplayer I highly recommend playing single for a little while.

To get it free:
http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,487009.0.html[/quote]OK thanks.

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:5, topic:436402”]It’s like bob the builder[/quote]xD Made me laugh in real

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone explain MineCraft to me?

item.title: Can someone explain MineCraft to me?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Acorn_:

I find it more enjoyable to play single player, basically you just build a house and mine resources and try to survive.

This, before even looking into joining multiplayer I highly recommend playing single for a little while.

To get it free:
http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,487009.0.html

item.title: Can someone explain MineCraft to me?
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

You can download server software called CraftBukkit. Bukkit is pretty basic itself, but you can go to the bukkit forums and download plugins. So pretty much every server is completely unique. Bad way of explaining it, but still.

Read full topic
